pos_mean_info_list.mean: 政府官员举行的记者招待会；提供背景资料的简报或报告

word_group.brief_definition: 背景信息；背景资料；背景资讯
背景调查；背景核查；查验背景
背景下；背景里；中的背景
背景资料；背景数据；后台数据

bilingual.source: It is very noisy in the background.
In the background, there are four or five houses.
And we should avoid making any noise in the background.
bilingual.target: 我们应该避免在背景中发出任何噪音。

bilingual.source: That's you in the front of the photo, but who is that in the background?
bilingual.target: 照片前面的是你，但背景里那是谁？

bilingual.source: Then the drawings on acetate are laid over the background and photographed to make the characters move.
bilingual.target: 然后将塑料片上的图画放在背景上拍照，使角色移动。
她的文化背景非常丰富。

bilingual.source: The background of this painting is dark.
bilingual.target: 这幅画的背景是暗色的。

list.abstract: background 简写属性在一个声明中设置所有的背景属性。

yingyinNormal.en: They're just doing a background check on me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们只是为了调查一下我的背景而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Each containing aliases, our background, everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 里面有我们的化名、背景、一切信息。

yingyinNormal.en: Physicists have mapped this cosmic microwave background across the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 物理学家已经绘制出了穿越宇宙的这种宇宙微波背景。

yingyinNormal.en: My priors? What are you talking about? Background, Bob. I am talking about your background.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的过往？你在说什么？你的背景，鲍勃，我在说你的背景。

yingyinNormal.en: Your background? In high school, I was a runner for a gang.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你背景？高中时，我是黑帮毒贩。

yingyinNormal.en: She wears the costume. Gunfire in the background. A hint of smoke. Our Mockingjay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让她穿上制服，用战场作为背景，再来点烟雾，这就是我们的嘲笑鸟。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey, all the roles got to dance a little. But believe me with your dance background it'll be a piece of cake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有的角色都要跳一点舞，但以你的舞蹈背景，小意思罢了。

yingyinNormal.en: No one else knows you're Internal Affairs? Howard's the only one who knew about me and my background.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没别人知道你是内务部的人吗？霍华德是唯一知道我和我背景的人。

yingyinNormal.en: He plays for the Yankees. Seriously, ESPN. Just once and a while, have it on in the background.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是洋基棒球队的球员，真的，多看ESPN，有时候，开着它当背景也好。

yingyinNormal.en: This gun was illegally obtained by a career criminal at a gun show where background checks aren't mandatory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这把枪是一个职业罪犯非法地在一个不强制背景审查的枪展上购得的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I could ask my dad. Maybe he can get some of his old cop buddies to do a background check on her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以让我爸查查她。或许他可以让他以前的警察朋友对她做一个背景调查。

yingyinNormal.en: I say we choose someone with a marketing background to help us sell what's never been sold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的意思是我们选一个有市场营销背景的人，让他来帮助我们把营销业绩提高到前所未有的水平

yingyinNormal.en: He saw my juvie record and knew I had the perfect background for the next time someone tried to infiltrate the academy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他看到了我的青少年犯罪记录，知道我有绝佳背景可以替他们潜伏进警校。

yingyinNormal.en: This one was ordered on the Internet. No background checks. This gun killed Bob and Sue Grant's 14 year old son.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这把是在网上购得，完全没有背景审查。这把枪打死了鲍勃和苏·格兰特14岁的儿子。

yingyinNormal.en: His work in black body form and anisotropy of the cosmic microwave background radiation cemented our understanding of the origin of the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对黑体和宇宙微波背景辐射的各向异性的研究跟宇宙起源的观点有许多相通之处。

yingyinNormal.en: And even though gun safety legislation to strengthen background checks has been voted down in congress at the time they were doing this interview.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，就在他们接受采访的同时，加强背景调查的枪支安全法遭到了国会的投票否决。

yingyinNormal.en: I did a comprehensive background check. Medical records, credit reports, criminal history. I trust you paid off those parking tickets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我对你的背景做了全面的调查，医疗记录，信用记录，犯罪史等等，我相信你已经缴清了那些停车罚单了吧。

yingyinNormal.en: His pediatrician happens to have a background in clinical genetics and he has no idea what's going on, but he says, "Let's get this kid's genome sequenced."
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的儿科医生恰好有临床遗传学方面的背景，他不知道问题出在哪儿，他说“让我们给他做基因组测序吧”。

yingyinNormal.en: For eight years, the team's telescopes scanned a patch in the sky measuring manual differences in the temperature of the cosmic microwave background and a pattern emerged.
yingyinNormal.zh: 八年以来，团队的望远镜扫描了天空的一片，测量了宇宙微波背景和出现的形状，在温度上的微小差异。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, they're highly-trained educators with background checks. They're even required to be current on all vaccinations. You leave her with me, and I'm not any of those things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们都是通过背景调查，训练有素的教育工作者。甚至要求身上所有疫苗皆要在有效期内你也让我照顾她啊，可刚才说的我一样都没有。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 出身背景; 个人背景
后景; 背景; 底色

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person's education, experience, and social circumstances
sense_info_list.zh: 出身背景; 个人背景

examination_example.sentence: Passengers must pay $85 every five years to process their <highlight>background</highlight> checks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乘客每五年须缴纳85美元才能进行背景调查。

examination_example.sentence: His paternal grandparents, a steward and a housekeeper, possessed even less status, having been servants, and Dickens later concealed their <highlight>background</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的祖父母，一个男管家一个女管家。作为仆人，社会地位更加低微，后来狄更斯对这样的出身背景进行了隐瞒。

examination_example.sentence: The findings do not simply explain people's tendency to befriend those of similar ethnic <highlight>backgrounds</highlight>, say the researchers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，这些发现并不能简单地解释人们倾向于和那些有相似种族背景的人交朋友。

sense_info_list.en: the circumstances or situation prevailing at a particular time or underlying a particular event

examination_example.sentence: It is against that <highlight>background</highlight> that the information commissioner, Elizabeth Denham, has issued her damning verdict against the Royal Free hospital trust under the NHS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这种背景下，信息专员伊丽莎白·德哈姆对公立医疗系统旗下的皇家免费医院进行指控。

examination_example.sentence: We ascribe meanings to texts on the basis of interaction between kinds organization and various kinds of <highlight>background</highlight> that we bring to the text.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们赋予文章以意义，基于各种组织和我们带入文章的各种背景之间的相互作用。

examination_example.sentence: People are, on the whole, poor at considering <highlight>background</highlight> information when making individual decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的来说，人们在做个人决定时不善于考虑背景信息。

sense_info_list.zh: 后景; 背景; 底色

土地;  地面;  领域

(舞台)背景; 声音背景; 背景幕布

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person's education, experience, and social circumstances
sense_info_list.zh: 经历; 学历/出身背景

examination_example.sentence: It can bridge the learning gap between kids of different <highlight>backgrounds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以弥补不同背景的孩子之间的学习差距。

examination_example.sentence: The educational benefits of selective schools largely disappear once pupils' inborn ability and socio­-economic <highlight>background</highlight> were taken into account.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦把学生的天生能力和社会经济背景考虑在内，精英学校的教育效益就会在很大程度上消失。

examination_example.sentence: They cater to students from different family <highlight>backgrounds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们满足来自不同家庭背景学生的需求。

examination_example.sentence: Many residents have <highlight>backgrounds</highlight> in engineering, business and academic circles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多居民具有工程，商业和学术界的背景。

sense_info_list.en: the circumstances or situation prevailing at a particular time or underlying a particular event

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>background</highlight> to this is that from the 1960s into the early 2000s, measures of average wellbeing went up in the US.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种情况的背景是，从1960年代到2000年代初，美国人的平均幸福指数一直都在提升。

sense_info_list.en: the part of a picture, photograph or view behind the main objects, people, or others
sense_info_list.zh: (舞台)背景; 声音背景; 背景幕布

examination_example.sentence: Musical training improves certain hearing capabilities, like filtering voices from <highlight>background</highlight> noise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 音乐训练可以提高某些听力能力，比如从背景噪音中过滤声音。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person's education; experience; and social circumstances
sense_info_list.zh: 经历; 学历/出身背景

examination_example.sentence: And whatever their financial <highlight>background</highlight>, or their educational <highlight>background</highlight>, most people will have something in common with each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论他们的经济背景或教育背景如何，大多数人都会有一些共同之处。

examination_example.sentence: An Asian-American studies professor placed greater emphasis on teacher training than on teachers' <highlight>background</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位研究美国亚裔的教授更重视对教师的培训，而不是教师的背景。

examination_example.sentence: Participants were balanced across the three groups for age, sex, educational <highlight>background</highlight>, severity and duration of depression, and use of antidepressants (抗抑郁药) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参与者在年龄、性别、教育背景、抑郁的严重程度和持续时间以及抗抑郁药的使用方面在三组之间保持平衡。

sense_info_list.en: the circumstances or situation prevailing at a particular time or underlying a particular event

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 背景信息；背景资料；背景资讯

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person's education, experience, and social circumstances
the circumstances or situation prevailing at a particular time or underlying a particular event

examination_example.sentence: The right level of <highlight>background</highlight> noise may interrupt our normal patterns of thinking just enough to allow our imaginations to wander.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 适当水平的背景噪音可能会干扰我们正常的思维模式，足以让我们的想象力游荡。

examination_example.sentence: Which level of <highlight>background</highlight> noise may promote creative thinking ability?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪种程度的背景噪音可以促进创造性思考的能力？

examination_example.sentence: It blocks out <highlight>background</highlight> noise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以阻挡背景噪音。

sense_info_list.en: a position or function that is not prominent or conspicuous
sense_info_list.zh: 幕后; 不显著的位置

examination_example.sentence: Athens was not in the farthest <highlight>background</highlight> of his mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雅典并不在他思想的最深处。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 回原处;  后面的;  向后地;  背部, 后面
土地;  地面;  领域

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: From Paragraph 1, we can get the <highlight>background</highlight> of the story.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从第一段，我们可以了解故事的背景。

examination_example.sentence: The painting is of the five oxen with no special <highlight>background</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这幅画是五头牛，没有特别的背景

examination_example.sentence: Another reason is that it helps pupils to understand the culture and <highlight>background</highlight> of the society they live in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个原因是它有助于学生理解他们所生活的社会的文化和背景。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 回原处;  后面的;  向后地;  背部, 后面
土地;  地面;  领域
